What We Do

Bespoke B&B is a property management service specializing in high-end vacation rentals.

Exposure

BespokeB&B is dedicated to driving top quality short-term renters to your property through a diverse network of powerful internet marketing platforms.

Revenue

Our business is entirely dependent on your success in the short-term rental market. We work hard every day to generate revenue for you in this new and lucrative market.

Ease of Mind

The model we employ at BespokeB&B allows property owners to be as little involved as they like. All we need are any necessary keys, codes, and dates of property availability. As soon as weâ€™re sorted you can kick back and let us do the work for you.

About

Who we are and what we do.

Our company consists of a small consortium of internet marketers, professional photographers, and residential property managers. With our unique set of skills, we focus on making your property work for you. We find renters by utilizing passive and social marketing, as well as keyword and location targeted internet advertising. At BespokeB&B we're dedicated to making your property known to vacationers, travelers, and corporate clients around the world. It's what we do.

Here at BespokeB&B, we operate on commission alone. Not only is this a great motivating factor for us as a company; it means that there is absolutely zero up-front risk for our property owning clients. Simply put: we don't get paid until you do. Why, you ask? Because we want you, the client, to feel comfortable with us managing your properties. As an added safety measure for our clients, each listing is covered for up to $1 million dollars worth of damages. We want you to sleep soundly at night knowing that, at the end of the day, your property is in good hands.

Our mission at BespokeB&B is to provide a new stream of revenue to the discerning property owner with ease and autonomy. Whether you're renting out your home while on holiday; your lake house in the off season; or your pied-Ã -terre in the cityâ€”we're confident we can generate revenue for you. All you have to do is kick back and relax.
